title: Cross-lingual Pre-training Based Transfer for Zero-shot Neural Machine Translation
question: which datasets did they experiment with?
generated_answer:
:: Main Results ::: Results on Europarl Dataset. We evaluate on French-English-Spanish (Fr-En-Es), German-English-French (De-En-Fr) and Romanian-English-German (Ro-En-De) where English acts as the pivot language, its left side is the source language, and its right side is the target language . We remove the multi-parallel sentences between different training corpora to ensure zero-shot settings
